name: Fertiberia S.A.
membership: Fertiberia is a member of Fertilizers Europe, ANFFE and FEIQUE
goal: Fertiberia is a private company enganged in the manufacture and trade of chemical fertilizers. In Europe, Fertiberia is running plants in Spain and Portugal.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: ETS, BREF, HORIZON 2020, NEW FERTILIZERS REGULATION, CIRCULAR ECONOMY, RESIDUES
